amendment.description: To make funds available for the Entry Exit System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 54 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 54 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S1350-1352; text: CR S1350) To make funds available for the Entry Exit System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 54 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 54 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Kyl.
